name: Stunning Finale
text: You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, assaulting the senses of the targets with your finale. Each target is stunned for 1 round. On a successful saving throw, a target is staggered for 1 round.

effects.text: up to 3 creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
effects.name: Targets
